name: User fills in the booking reservation form and presents identity attestations
scenarioId: ios/A_combined_business_scenario_on_Travel_4/Travel_Book_reservation_by_presenting_attestations_remotely-Booking_Service-remote_cross_device_66/bookReservationCrossDevice:User fills in the booking reservation form and presents identity attestations
methodName: User fills in the booking reservation form and presents identity attestations

testSteps.description: Given the user visits the Booking Service on their desktop PC
And the Booking Service presents a booking reservation form
When the user fills in the booking reservation form fields
Then the user selects to present the attestations with the EUDI Wallet

userStory.storyName: Booking Service Reservation with EUDI Wallet (cross device)
userStory.displayName: Booking Service Reservation with EUDI Wallet (cross device)
userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want to book my reservation by present attestations from my EUDI Wallet to the requesting Relying Party (i.e. ‘Booking Service’)
  So that I can be authenticated by the Relying Party and book my reservation as part of my travel arrangements

title: User fills in the booking reservation form and presents identity attestations
